area_raw: all squares in a 20-foot-radius burst that contain plants or fungi
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Entangle](/Spells.aspx?ID=103)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 336 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Green Man](/Deities.aspx?ID=666), [Immaculate Growth](/Deities.aspx?ID=364), [Kzininn](/Deities.aspx?ID=667), [Nhimbaloth](/Deities.aspx?ID=572), [Sicva](/Deities.aspx?ID=411)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** all squares in a 20-foot-radius burst that contain plants or fungi

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Plants and fungi in the area entangle creatures. The area counts as difficult terrain. Each round that a creature starts its turn in the area, it must attempt a Reflex save. On a failure, it takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area, and on a critical failure, it is also immobilized for 1 round. Creatures can attempt to Escape at _entangle_'s DC to remove these effects.
name: Entangle
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 336 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Green Man](/Deities.aspx?ID=666), [Immaculate Growth](/Deities.aspx?ID=364), [Kzininn](/Deities.aspx?ID=667), [Nhimbaloth](/Deities.aspx?ID=572), [Sicva](/Deities.aspx?ID=411)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** all squares in a 20-foot-radius burst that contain plants or fungi

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Plants and fungi in an area grow to entangle and immobilize.
</summary>
summary: Plants and fungi in an area grow to entangle and immobilize.
summary_markdown: Plants and fungi in an area grow to entangle and immobilize.
text: Entangle Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 336 4.0 Tradition Primal Deities Green Man, Immaculate Growth, Kzininn, Nhimbaloth, Sicva Cast somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area all squares in a 20-foot-radius burst that contain plants or fungi Duration 1 minute --- Plants and fungi in the area entangle creatures. The area counts as difficult terrain. Each round that a creature starts its turn in the area, it must attempt a Reflex save. On a failure, it takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area, and on a critical failure, it is also immobilized for 1 round. Creatures can attempt to Escape at entangle 's DC to remove these effects.
